quote.text: « Cinema is not a spectacle, it is a form of writing. »
quote.author: — Jean Cocteau

quote0.text: Photography is truth. Cinema is truth twenty-four times per second.

quote1.text: I've always preferred the reflection of life to life itself.

quote2.text: Cinematography is writing with moving images and sounds.

quote4.text: Cinema is not a spectacle, it is a form of writing.

quote5.text: For me, suspense is giving the audience information the characters don't have.

quote6.text: My films are questions being asked.

quote7.text: The enemy of cinema is the screenplay.

quote8.text: I don't tell stories, I show people.

quote9.text: In a good film, every scene must be necessary.

quote10.text: The rule of the game is that there are no rules.

quote11.text: Cinema is an eye open to the world.

quote12.text: Cinema is the art of seeing differently.

quote13.text: The dream is the only reality that matters.

quote15.text: Editing is the essence of cinema.

quote17.text: Cinema doesn't film reality, it reveals it.

quote18.text: The sacred and the profane are never separate.

quote19.text: Cinema must be a way of seeing the world.

quote20.text: The tracking shot is a matter of morality.

quote21.text: Cinema is the art of watching people live.

quote22.text: Memory is the only editing that matters.

quote23.text: Time in cinema is not clock time.

quote25.text: A film is never finished, it's abandoned.

quote26.text: Cinema is the impossibility of dying.

quote27.text: Cinema is made for wasting time.

quote29.text: To write is to film. To film is to write.

quote30.text: A good film starts with a good title.

quote31.text: Cinema is the art of not showing.

quote32.text: Cinema is a question of truth.

quote33.text: Beauty is in the gaze, never in the object.

quote34.text: A film is a world seen through a keyhole.

quote35.text: Cinema is a question of love.

quote36.text: Silence in cinema is as important as speech in theater.

quote37.text: Time is the only thing that matters in cinema.

quote38.text: Cinema is the art of time that passes and remains.

quote40.text: Cinema is an art of presence.

quote41.text: Cinema is the flesh of the world.

quote42.text: Cinema is made of repetitions and chance.

quote44.text: Cinema is a question of gazes.

quote45.text: Time in cinema is the time it takes.

quote46.text: Cinema is life without the boring parts.

quote47.text: Cinema is a question of desire.

quote48.text: Cinema is seeing what cannot be said.

quote49.text: Cinema is the art of pure time.

quote50.text: Cinema is the childhood of art.

quote51.text: Cinema is made of images and blood.
